00066 /* find nearest */
00067 
00068 typedef struct NearestHit {
00069     struct BMFace *efa;
00070     struct MTexPoly *tf;
00071     struct BMLoop *l, *nextl;
00072     struct MLoopUV *luv, *nextluv;
00073     int lindex; //index of loop within face
00074     int vert1, vert2; //index in mesh of edge vertices
00075 } NearestHit;

00085 /* smart stitch */
00086 
00087 /* object that stores display data for previewing before accepting stitching */
00088 typedef struct StitchPreviewer {
00089     /* here we'll store the preview triangle indices of the mesh */
00090     float *preview_polys;
00091     /* uvs per polygon. */
00092     unsigned int *uvs_per_polygon;
00093     /*number of preview polygons */
00094     unsigned int num_polys;
00095     /* preview data. These will be either the previewed vertices or edges depending on stitch mode settings */
00096     float *preview_stitchable;
00097     float *preview_unstitchable;
00098     /* here we'll store the number of elements to be drawn */
00099     unsigned int num_stitchable;
00100     unsigned int num_unstitchable;
00101     unsigned int preview_uvs;
00102     /* ...and here we'll store the triangles*/
00103     float *static_tris;
00104     unsigned int num_static_tris;
00105 } StitchPreviewer;
00106 
00107 StitchPreviewer *uv_get_stitch_previewer(void);
